name: java-to-javascript
description: Convert Java Classes to ES6 Classes

scripts.build-all: npm run build && npm run examples
scripts.examples: bash -c 'for file in ./examples/*.java; do node ./cli.js $file $([[ "$file" = *"p5"* ]] && echo --p5); done'
scripts.deploy: VERSION=$(node -p 'require("./package.json").version') && [ $VERSION = $(npm view java-to-javascript version) ] && exit 1 || git tag "v$VERSION" && git push --follow-tags origin master
